Room.Text: *I'm on a ridge above a narrow ravine I see mountains in the distance
*I'm on a ridge above a ravine
*I'm flat on my back in a manure pile

ADVENT.Message: by Scott Adams dedicated: the Cherens
I've nothing to do that with
BONUS points out of a possible 50 in
its full of sage brush, tumbleweed and is impassable
The dry wash is burnt clear
Don't collect $200 then don't pass GO! CONTRAPOSITIVE.
Nights are cold! I caught Pneumonia
TOO CLOSE! Pieces of me rain down for days!
Is he a ghost? Anyway wrong idea.
may need to say a magic word here

Item.Text: Wraithlike figure playing equally ghostly piano
Hole kicked in wall and bare hoof print
